definition: to fall ill/to contract a disease
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: "We hardly get sick at all, " Mrs McKamey says hopefully.
sentences.chinese: “我們根本不怎麼得病，”麥克康美太太自我安慰說。

sentences.english: He has fallen ell and suffered fever for a week.
sentences.chinese: 他得病並且發燒已有一個星期了。

sentences.english: Doctors are finding that more and more non-smokers are falling ill because of the effects of other people's smoking.
sentences.chinese: 醫生髮現越來越多的人得病是受其他吸菸人的影響。

sentences.english: Studies suggest that diets abundant in flavonoid-rich foods can lower heart disease risk.
sentences.chinese: 研究建議食用大量富含類黃酮的食物來降低得病率。

sentences.english: Shouzhen class These are not speaking, the stresses of us will get sick.
sentences.chinese: 守貞課上這些都不講，專講性會讓我們得病。

sentences.english: It reduces the skin's ability to release excess heat, making the body more susceptible to heat-related illness.
sentences.chinese: 降低了皮膚的散熱能力，使人更容易得病。

sentences.english: Customers in bars usually wouldn't check what they are drinking, which raises the chance of getting a disease.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的顧客通常不能辨別真假，這增加了得病的可能。

sentences.english: A pet may founder if fed improperly.
sentences.chinese: 寵物如餵養不當可得病。

sentences.english: It was uncertain whether that would kill or sicken the turtles.
sentences.chinese: 而這還不能確定是否會引起海龜死亡或得病。

sentences.english: People can get sick if they eat food touched by floodwaters.
sentences.chinese: 人們如果食用了被洪水浸染過的食物就會得病。

sentences.english: That would explain the high number of people who got sick.
sentences.chinese: 這也許能解釋爲什麼這麼多人得病的原因。

sentences.english: On hearing that her husband was ill, she balled of  that work and hurried back home.
sentences.chinese: 一聽丈夫得病，她就把那項工作草草了事並趕回家去。

sentences.english: Our evil actions cling almost disease-like to our soul and might thus be carried to the Hereafter.
sentences.chinese: 我們的惡行會使靈魂得病，也會受到後世的審判。

sentences.english: How likely am I to get it?
sentences.chinese: 我得病的可能性有多大？

sentences.english: So I did not know of Mor rie's illness.
sentences.chinese: 因此我毫不知曉莫里得病的情況。

definition: to catch an illness/to get infected with a disease
to fall sick/to contract an illness
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
